message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000! I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products, and I'm confident you'll love it. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on this unique item. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands for $10000?
I'll take the product, but I'm hoping it's high quality!

I'm glad you're excited about the product! As I mentioned earlier, I've had great feedback from other customers, but I understand that everyone's tastes are different. Since you're taking a chance on this one, I'll throw in a special bonus: I'll give you a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of your purchase. It's a $500 value, absolutely free! What do you think? Is $10000 still a good deal for you?
I'm not interested in the bonus, I'll pass on this one.

I understand your hesitation last time, but I assure you this product is a game-changer! I've had several high-profile customers rave about its exceptional quality and performance. I'm willing to make a special exception for you - I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely thrilled with the product, I'll work with you to make it right. And, of course, the price remains the same at $10000. What do you think? Is this the opportunity you've been waiting for?
I'll take the product, but I'm still a bit skeptical.

I'm thrilled you're giving me another chance! As you can see, I'm not just making claims about the product's quality - I'm willing to back it up with a guarantee. And speaking of guarantees, I'll throw in a special 5-year warranty on this product. That's double the standard warranty, and it shows how confident I am in its performance. Plus, I'll give you a personalized demo of the product's features and benefits, so you can see for yourself why it's worth every penny of the $10000. What do you say? Are you ready to experience the best?
I'm sold! I'll take the product and the warranty, and I'm looking forward to the demo.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! However, I want to be upfront with you - this next product is a bit of a departure from our usual standards. It's still a great value at $10000, but I want to make sure you're aware that it may not meet the same level of quality as our previous offerings. That being said, it's still a unique opportunity to get your hands on a product that's hard to find elsewhere. And, as a special offer, I'll throw in a free upgrade to expedited shipping, so you can get it quickly and start enjoying it sooner. What do you think? Is the potential value worth the risk?
I'm not sure if I'm willing to take the risk on a product that may not meet the same level of quality as the previous ones. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your hesitation, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make one more offer to sweeten the deal. I'll give you an exclusive deal on this product - I'll throw in a second, identical product absolutely free. That's right, you'll get two products for the price of one! It's a $20000 value for just $10000. And, as before, I'll include expedited shipping so you can get them quickly. What do you think? Is this a deal that's too good to pass up?
I'm not interested in the free product, I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're not interested in the bundle deal, but I want to make one more offer that's just for you. I'll give you a special'mystery discount' that will bring the price of the product down to $8000. It's a one-time offer, and it's only available to you. I'm willing to take a loss on this sale just to get this product off my hands. What do you think? Is $8000 a price you're willing to pay for this product?
I'm not interested in the mystery discount, I'll pass on this one.

I'm glad to be back to offering high-quality products! This one is truly exceptional, and I think you'll be thrilled with it. I'm willing to make a special exception for you - I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, just for being a valued customer. That brings the price down to $9000. Plus, I'll include a personalized thank-you note from the manufacturer, signed by the CEO. What do you think? Is this a deal that's worth considering?
I'll take the product, and I'm hoping it's high quality this time!

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! This next one is also a high-quality product, and I think you'll be impressed with its performance. As a valued customer, I want to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase a limited-edition variant of this product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that's not available anywhere else, and it comes with a certificate of authenticity signed by the designer. The price for this limited-edition variant is $11000, but I'll give you a special deal - I'll throw in a free consultation with the designer to discuss how to get the most out of your new product. What do you think? Is this a unique opportunity worth considering?
I'll take the limited-edition variant, and I'm looking forward to the consultation with the designer.

I'm glad you're excited about the limited-edition variant! Unfortunately, this next product isn't quite up to our usual standards. However, I want to make it right with you. I'll give you a special deal - I'll throw in a full refund if you're not completely satisfied with the product. That's right, you can try it risk-free. And, as an added bonus, I'll include a $500 gift card to use on any future purchase. What do you think? Is the potential value worth the risk?
I'm not interested in taking the risk on a product that's not up to your usual standards. I'll pass on this one.
